concept.title: Save a View
concept.shortdesc: When you name and save a view, the following settings are saved:

ul.li: Magnification, center point, and view direction
The location of the view: the Model tab or a specific layout tab
Layer visibility in the drawing at the time the view is saved

conbody.p: If you have divided the drawing window into multiple views, you can save the current window arrangement so that you can recall it to the screen later. The number and placement of the windows are saved exactly as they are currently displayed. The settings for each window are also saved.
